Name: Device_v1-0
Description: Controls and retrieves information about device settings and toggles. This tool allows users to change device configurations, toggle settings on/off, retrieve current setting values, and perform batch operations on multiple settings.

Functions.description: Changes a specified device setting to the provided value.

name.description: The name of the device setting to modify.

value.description: The new value to set for the specified setting.

Functions.description: Toggles a specified device setting on, off, or switches its current state.

name.description: The name of the device toggle setting to modify.

action.description: The action to perform on the toggle setting.

Functions.description: Retrieves information about a specified device setting.

name.description: The name of the device setting to retrieve information for.

Functions.description: Executes multiple device setting operations in a single batch. At least one array of actions must be provided.

toggle_actions.description: Array of toggle actions to perform.

name.description: Enum using the name values of 'change_toggle' function

set_value_actions.description: Array of set value actions to perform.

name.description: Enum using the name values of 'set_value' function

get_value_actions.description: Array of setting names to retrieve values for.

items.description: Enum using the name values of 'get_value' function
